sentences.sentence: If you have a verruca, cover it with a plaster when you go swimming.
sentences.translation: 如果您有疣，包括它与石膏当您去游泳。

sentences.sentence: Objective to evaluate the effect of microwave tissue coagulation (MTC) to treat verruca vulgaris.
